artist: Artist: Auguste Louis Lepère; Editor: A. Desmoulins
description: people walking down a ramp in LLC; boats on shore at center; Eiffel Tower, URQ
portfolio: From Le Long de la Seine et des Boulevards

title: The Point-du-Jour, from "Along the Seine and the Boulevards"
